name: Figma Tips & Tricks
description:
A collection of easy to learn tips in compact "Post-it" format. Each tip is a component, so if you publish this file as a Library to your team/organization, you and your colleagues can place these tips on other files where it's going to be helpful for others.


Last updates:

  • Added a quick collection of must-have plugins
  • Added the very basic tip of how to move around the canvas
  • Added the tip about how to set file thumbnails
  • Made the Variants tip a bit less gigantic
